page.title: 08INDUSTRY
page.content:
Thurlstone and the road through the valley. It is only really noticeable from Rockside, a road leading upwards on the southern side of the valley.
Hoylands, a small umbrella factory in the valley between the two settlements makes and employs people, includiong local people who do some assembly work in their own homes.
Originally there was a number of water powered corn mills along the river, hence the name Millhouse. Now there is only one firm, Goldthorpes, still in operation. Goldthorpes have extended their business from their original site at Bullhouse, Millhouse, where they manufacture animal feedstuffs. Broadbents haulage company is based in Millhouse.
